elesa mudrana shilpaya pathira giya nagara saha mudranala pihituwu warsha meseyi. 1821 pune saha surath 1823 kottayam 1826 nagpur saha belari 1827 nagar koyil 1828 patna 1830 kanpur 1834 mirut saha dilliya 1835 agra 1836 ladhiyana 1838 kutak 1839 alahabad, marisapur saha thriwendram 1840 bangalor saha wishakhapattanam 1842 ahamadnagar saha mangalor 1844 waranasi 1846 musaparpur saha 1850 lahor.mema mudranalawala ee pradeshawala bhawitha wu pradeshiya bhashawalin saha ingrisi bhashawen poth mudranaya kerina. 20 wana siyawasa aarambha wana wita indiyawa pura mudranala rashiyak bihi wi thibina.bobi ji.

paudgalika bas ratha karmanthayen bas ratha magi janathawa iwath wimata hethu kipayak pawathi.paudgalika bas ratha wala riyaduran menma kondostharawarun thula boho awasthawaladi kisima winayak natha.bas ratha magi janathawa owunge wahallu lesa sitha kriya karayi.ithuru salli illu wita janathawa maha bankuwa yayi sithamin bana wadiyi.marga anka 176/168/119nugegoda/120/162 bas ratha margayanhi paudgalika bas ratha riyaduran boho dena samahara awasthawanhidi bimathwa bas ratha dhawanaya yedeyi.
